original_title: How I Met My Girlfriend Kimmy Granger
overview: Going on a first date with the cutest energy bombshell with the cutest smile and a perfect ass that fits in the palm of your hands is bound to be a thrilling experience... Curious about what Kimmy Granger is capable of on a first date if she later couldn't resist blowing you on a picnic in the park? You'll have to use your charm and wit if you want to impress this chick... especially if you want to fuck her on the first date! Bring out the big guns and get ready to meet your future girlfriend: Kimmy Granger!
title: How I Met My Girlfriend Kimmy Granger
